description: An ancient settlement and seaport in Macedonia, located south of modern Makrigialos. According to Apollodorus, the population was relocated to a new, inland site by Archelaos (see Pydna/Kitron), but it is clear that this original, coastal site was reoccupied.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: near Makriyialos
